document_data.name: Syndra Silvane
document_data.mainbody: '''Syndra Silvane''' ({{Pronounce|SIN|draw|_|sil|VAIN|refs=}}) was a merchant and former adventurer living in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Syndra was an adventurer in her youth. At some point, she died and was raised from the dead, at which point she quit her adventuring career. She eventually became a merchant.

In the late 15{{th}} century, she became afflicted with the [[death curse]] and began to slowly die. After [[cleric]]s were unable to help her, she contacted the [[Harpers]], who indicated to her that the cause of the death curse was a [[necromantic]] [[artifact]] called the [[Soulmonger]] located in [[Chult]].

After learning this news, Syndra gathered information about Chult and inscribed it upon a map. She began hiring teams of adventurers to travel into the jungles of Chult. Several of these teams subsequently disappeared into the jungle and fell victim to its perils.
document_data.Description: After becoming affected by the [[death curse]], Syndra began wearing a hood and silver mask to hide her features.
document_data.Relationships: Syndra Silvane was friends with [[Wakanga O'tamu]], one of the merchant princes of [[Port Nyanzaru]].
